vote.title: Authorize the (1) acceptance of a grant from Downtown Dallas Inc. Foundation in the amount of $150,000.00 for the creation of an engaging garden and patio space at J. Erik Jonsson Central Library; (2) receipt and deposit of funds in an amount not to exceed $150,000.00 in the Dallas Public Library Gifts & Donations Fund Central Library Gift Fund; (3) establishment increase of appropriations in an amount not to exceed $150,000.00 in the Dallas Public Library Gifts & Donations Fund Central Library Gift Fund; and (4) execution of the grant agreement and all terms, conditions, and documents required by the grant agreement - Not to exceed $150,000.00 - Financing: Dallas Public Library Gifts & Donations Fund Central Library Gift Fund
